methods.name: updatePosition
methods.description: There are some custom scenarios for which Quasar cannot automatically reposition the tooltip without significant performance drawbacks so the optimal solution is for you to call this method when you need it
methods.description_zh: 在某些自定义场景中，类星体无法自动重新定位工具提示，而不会出现明显的性能缺陷，因此最佳解决方案是在需要时调用此方法

max-height.desc: The maximum height of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name

max-width.desc: The maximum width of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name

anchor.description: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the Tooltip relative to its target
anchor.description_zh: 两个值设置工具提示相对于其目标的起始位置或锚点

self.description: Two values setting the Tooltip's own position relative to its target
self.description_zh: 两个值设置工具提示自身相对于其目标的位置

offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the Tooltip horizontally and vertically in pixels
offset.description_zh: 由两个数字组成的数组，用于水平和垂直偏移工具提示（以像素为单位）

target.description: Configure a target element to trigger Tooltip toggle; 'true' means it enables the parent DOM element, 'false' means it disables attaching events to any DOM elements; By using a String (CSS selector) it attaches the events to the specified DOM element (if it exists)
target.description_zh: 配置目标元素以触发工具提示切换;'true' 表示启用父 DOM 元素，“false' 表示禁用将事件附加到任何 DOM 元素;通过使用 String（CSS 选择器），它将事件附加到指定的 DOM 元素（如果存在）

no-parent-event.description: Skips attaching events to the target DOM element (that trigger the element to get shown)
no-parent-event.description_zh: 跳过将事件附加到目标 DOM 元素（触发元素显示）

delay.description: Configure Tooltip to appear with delay
delay.description_zh: 将工具提示配置为延迟显示

hide-delay.description: Configure Tooltip to disappear with delay
hide-delay.description_zh: 将工具提示配置为延迟消失
